snippet: Robert De Niro wasn't home, but Celeste Holm and her husband for a time couldn't leave their own apartment, in the same Central Park West building.
abstract: Robert De Niro wasn't home, but Celeste Holm and her husband for a time couldn't leave their own apartment, in the same Central Park West building.

headline.main: Small Fire Breaks Out in De Niro's Apartment Building
headline.print_headline: De Niro’s Building Disrupted by Fire
